## FieldImage class

Class for an image on a block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FieldImage extends Field<string> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Field](./blockly.field_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [EDITABLE](./blockly.fieldimage_class.editable_property.md) | <code>readonly</code> | (not declared) | Editable fields usually show some sort of UI indicating they are editable. This field should not. |
|  [isDirty\_](./blockly.fieldimage_class.isdirty__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Used to tell if the field needs to be rendered the next time the block is rendered. Image fields are statically sized, and only need to be rendered at initialization. |
